revisions.rev:
{{Infobox Album | Name = Before the Beach | Type = compilation | Artist = [[Jimmy Buffett]] | Cover = Before the Beach.jpg | Released = May 1993 | Recorded = 1970, 1971 | Genre = [[Folk rock]] | Length = 70:23 | Label = [[MCA Records|MCA]]
MCAD-10823 ([[United States|U.S.]], [[compact disc|CD]]) | Producer = Travis Turk | Last album = | This album = | Next album = }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1score = {{Rating|2|5}}[{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r170211|pure_url=yes}} Allmusic review] }} '''''Before the Beach''''' is a [[compilation album|compilation]] [[album]] by [[United States|American]] popular music [[singer-songwriter]] [[Jimmy Buffett]]. It includes the entire original releases of his first two albums, ''[[Down to Earth (Jimmy Buffett album)|Down to Earth]]'' and ''[[High Cumberland Jubilee]]'' except for "The Christian?" and "Ain't He a Genius" (from ''Down to Earth'') but with the addition of "High Cumberland Dilemma" which was recorded for but not included on the original ''High Cumberland Jubilee'' album. ''Before the Beach'' was released in May 1993 on [[MCA Records|MCA]] 10823 and was the first [[compact disc]] of material from ''Down to Earth'' and ''High Cumberland Jubilee''. It is the only collection of those albums material to appear on the music charts, reaching #169 on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] in 1993. == See also == * ''[[Down to Earth (Jimmy Buffett album)|Down to Earth]]'' * ''[[High Cumberland Jubilee]]'' * [[Down to Earth and High Cumberland Jubilee compilations]] == Notes == {{reflist|1}} == External links == * [http://www.buffettremasters.com/discography/beforebeach.htm Before the Beach] at BuffettRemasters.com {{1990s-rock-album-stub}} {{Jimmy Buffett}} [[Category:1993 compilation albums]] [[Category:Jimmy Buffett compilation albums]] [[Category:MCA Records compilation albums]]
